metadata.description:
Want to be as strong as Thor and as wise as Odin? Play this Nordic myth based ARPG game on http://www.lekool.com.

Odin Quest is an action RPG that features five different classes: Warrior, Mage, Priest, Assassin, and Hunter. Each class has unique strengths and weaknesses, and each has their own special mount to obtain. You'll fight against countless numbers of monsters, each who can drop equipment and money. The game gives an extensive upgrade system for each piece of gear you obtain. Various dungeons are scattered throughout the game, giving a good challenge for players interested in conquering them. The game also features a PvP system, letting you face off against players to test your skill.
